targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  toStartOfMinute(Timestamp) as bucketed_timestamp,
  dst_ip,
  count(dst_ip) as Value
FROM "otel"."sslo_logs"
WHERE 
  (hostname = '${device_name}' OR '${device_name}' = 'all') AND
  (sslo_host = '${sslo_host}' OR '${sslo_host}' = 'all') AND
  (vip = '${virtual_server}' OR '${virtual_server}' = 'all') AND
  (Timestamp >= $__fromTime AND Timestamp <= $__toTime)
GROUP BY bucketed_timestamp, dst_ip
ORDER BY bucketed_timestamp DESC

with qa AS (
  SELECT 
  toStartOfMinute(Timestamp) as bucketed_timestamp,
  vip,
  quantiles(0.5, 0.75, 0.99)(duration) as quants
FROM "otel"."sslo_logs"
WHERE 
  (hostname = '${device_name}' OR '${device_name}' = 'all') AND
  (sslo_host = '${sslo_host}' OR '${sslo_host}' = 'all') AND
  (vip = '${virtual_server}' OR '${virtual_server}' = 'all') AND
  (Timestamp >= $__fromTime AND Timestamp <= $__toTime)
GROUP BY bucketed_timestamp, vip
ORDER BY bucketed_timestamp DESC
)
SELECT
  qa.bucketed_timestamp AS bucketed_timestamp,
  qa.vip AS vip,
  arrayElement(qa.quants, 1) AS p50,
  arrayElement(qa.quants, 2) AS p75,
  arrayElement(qa.quants, 3) AS p99
FROM qa

SELECT 
  toStartOfMinute(Timestamp) as bucketed_timestamp,
  sslo_host,
  avg(client_bytes_in) as In,
  avg(client_bytes_out) as Out
FROM "otel"."sslo_logs"
WHERE 
  (hostname = '${device_name}' OR '${device_name}' = 'all') AND
  (sslo_host = '${sslo_host}' OR '${sslo_host}' = 'all') AND
  (vip = '${virtual_server}' OR '${virtual_server}' = 'all') AND
  (Timestamp >= $__fromTime AND Timestamp <= $__toTime)
GROUP BY bucketed_timestamp, sslo_host
ORDER BY bucketed_timestamp DESC

panels.title: Avg Client Bytes In/Out By SSLO Hostname

targets.rawSql:
SELECT src_ip, count(src_ip) as Value FROM "otel"."sslo_logs" WHERE 
  (hostname = '${device_name}' OR '${device_name}' = 'all') AND
  (sslo_host = '${sslo_host}' OR '${sslo_host}' = 'all') AND
  (vip = '${virtual_server}' OR '${virtual_server}' = 'all') AND
  ( Timestamp >= $__fromTime AND Timestamp <= $__toTime )
GROUP BY src_ip ORDER by Value DESC  LIMIT ${N}

SELECT dst_ip, count(dst_ip) as Value FROM "otel"."sslo_logs" WHERE 
  (hostname = '${device_name}' OR '${device_name}' = 'all') AND
  (sslo_host = '${sslo_host}' OR '${sslo_host}' = 'all') AND
  (vip = '${virtual_server}' OR '${virtual_server}' = 'all') AND
  ( Timestamp >= $__fromTime AND Timestamp <= $__toTime )
GROUP BY dst_ip ORDER by Value DESC  LIMIT ${N}
